title: Very Real
author: PluggedWisdom
citation: PluggedWisdom. "Very Real: experience with Smoking Blend ('Sense') (ID 71012)". Erowid.org. May 7, 2008. erowid.org/exp/71012
report:
This is the first smoking mix that I've tried that comes close to the real cannabis resin experience, and I've smoked a lot.

Very subtle to start. Within 30 min graduates to a heavy indica type smoke - drowsy, chilled. Within 1 hour this is surpassed by a 'Leb Red' type high & euphoria. Very nice.

No hangover but touch expensive and on reflextion I should made it 1g a joint to spread it out more.

Overall I rate it very good.
